title: Classic rice pudding
description: Have this creamy rice pudding cooking in the oven while you make dinner and round off your meal with a comforting pud. Serve with jam for a feel-good treat

title: Gory guts pizza tear 'n' share bread
description: Throw a Halloween party to remember with this gory tear 'n' share bread. Make a tomato sauce base and use the pizza fillings of your choice

title: Slow-cooked vine tomatoes with garlic
description: Enjoy slow-cooked vine tomatoes with garlic as a summer side dish. Woody herbs like thyme, rosemary or bay can also be added to flavour the oil

title: Sticky tamarind tomato & spinach whirl
description: Try this riff on a Greek spanakopita. With a sticky-sweet, spiced and tangy twist, it's a spectacular veggie centrepiece for any special occasion

title: Scotch broth
description: Tuck into a hearty bowl of Scotch broth soup for a healthy lunch or supper. Packed with veg and grains, serve with a hunk of crusty bread

title: Chicken, spinach & bacon alfredo pasta bake
description: Contains pork - recipe is for non-Muslims only

title: Beef & Boston baked beans
description: Contains pork - recipe is for non-Muslims only

title: Chunky chilli
description: Use chunks of stewing beef in your chilli con carne for a robust and filling dish. Serve with rice and coriander

title: Pizza baked potato
description: This budget-friendly supper combines two favourites in one dish. Top your jacket spuds with cheese, tomato, pepperoni and basil

title: Jacket potatoes with home-baked beans
description: Cold nights require comfort food, and there's no better than jacket potatoes - give yours a health boost with home-baked beans

title: Lentil ragu
description: Struggle to get your five-a-day? This superhealthy ragu will get you four steps closer and can be frozen for extra convenience
